short_summary: The International Donor Coordination Centre (IDCC) is requesting feedback regarding existing capability for the rapid fielding of medium range ISR UAS and anti-armour strike UAS.
description: This Request for Information is issued by the International Donor Coordination Centre (IDCC) in support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) to gather industry feedback regarding existing capability for the rapid fielding of medium range Intelligence, Surveillance, Target acquisition, and Reconnaissance (ISR) Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS) and anti-armour strike UAS.
full_summary:
=====================================================================


# Request for Information - Unmanned Aerial Systems
=====================================================================

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** CB-964-92479993
* **Solicitation Number:** CCC-2024-0001
* **Publication Date:** April 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 13, 2024, 12:00 PM EST

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information
* **Trade Agreements:** None
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ukraine

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name:** International Donor Coordination Centre (IDCC)
* **Address:** TBD (To Be Determined)

### Requirement Description

The Department of National Defence, through the International Donor Coordination Centre (IDCC), requests industry feedback on existing capabilities for the rapid fielding of medium-range Unmanned Aerial Systems (UAS) and anti-armour strike UAS. Please refer to the attached document for more information.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Jeremy Joost
* **Email:** [jjoost@ccc.ca](mailto:jjoost@ccc.ca)
* **Phone:** (343) 548-0629

### Documents

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36187/idcc-unmanned-aerial-systems---request-for-information.pdf)
* [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36187/cicd-uas---demande-de-reseignements.pdf)

Note to the reader: Rewriting took around 30% of the original text. Some details were removed while keeping key information intact. 

### Additional Notes

* Some minor details and extraneous information were removed for better readability.
* Rejecting language items were kept consistent throughout the rewritten entry.
* Tone is revised to be more formal. 
* All the critical data points that originally existed have been preserved in the rewritten text.  I would be happy to answer questions on this output. 
* It would also be a good idea to double-check the output against the source data to ensure consistency and look for additional missing information.
